resources.string: We use cookies to enhance your browsing experience and collect information about how you interact with our website. You can choose to accept or decline cookies through your browser settings, but please note that disabling cookies may affect the functionality of our website.

NomNom reserves the right to modify or amend this Privacy Policy at any time. Any changes will be effective immediately upon posting to the site. Your continued use of the site following the posting of changes to this policy will mean you accept those changes.
If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy or our privacy practices, please contact us via email, livechat, hotline or social media channels immediately.
This Privacy Policy outlines how NomNom collects, uses, discloses, and protects your personal information.
By using NomNom, you agree to the terms of this Privacy Policy. Thank you for trusting us with your personal information.

Protecting your privacy is important to us. This Privacy Policy outlines how NomNom collects, uses, discloses, and protects your personal information. By accessing or using our website and services, you consent to the collection and use of your information as described in this policy.

1. Information Collection 

We may collect personal information from you when you visit our website, place an order, subscribe to our newsletter, or engage with us through social media. The types of personal information we may collect include your name, email address, shipping address, payment information, and any other information you voluntarily provide to us.

2. Use of Information 

We use the information we collect to process your orders, communicate with you about your purchases, send you promotional offers and newsletters (if you opt-in), improve our products and services, and personalize your shopping experience. We may also use your information to detect and prevent fraud or unauthorized transactions.

3. Disclosure of Information 

We do not sell, trade, or otherwise transfer your personal information to outside parties unless we provide you with advance notice or obtain your consent. However, we may share your information with trusted third-party service providers who assist us in operating our website, conducting our business, or servicing you.

4. Data Security 

We implement a variety of security measures to safeguard your personal information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction. We use encryption technology to protect sensitive information transmitted online and restrict access to your information to only those employees who need it to perform their duties.

5. Cookies 

We use cookies to enhance your browsing experience and collect information about how you interact with our website. You can choose to accept or decline cookies through your browser settings, but please note that disabling cookies may affect the functionality of our website.

6. Changes to Privacy Policy 

NomNom reserves the right to modify or amend this Privacy Policy at any time. Any changes will be effective immediately upon posting to the site. Your continued use of the site following the posting of changes to this policy will mean you accept those changes.

7. Contact Us 

If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy or our privacy practices, please contact us immediately.

By using NomNom, you agree to the terms of this Privacy Policy. Thank you for trusting us with your personal information.

Welcome to NomNom! These Terms of Service govern your use of our website and services. By accessing or using NomNom, you agree to comply with these terms. Please read them carefully.

1. Acceptance of Terms

By accessing or using NomNom, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service. If you do not agree to all the terms and conditions of this agreement, then you may not access the website or use any services.

2. Use of Services

You agree to use NomNom's services solely for lawful purposes and in accordance with these Terms of Service. You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account and password and for restricting access to your computer. You agree to accept responsibility for all activities that occur under your account or password.

3. Privacy

Your privacy is important to us. Please review our Privacy Policy to understand how we collect, use, and disclose information about you.

4. Intellectual Property

All content on NomNom, including but not limited to text, graphics, logos, images, and software, is the property of NomNom or its licensors and is protected by copyright, trademark, and other laws. You may not modify, reproduce, distribute, or create derivative works based on such content without our prior written consent.

5. Prohibited Activities: 

You agree not to engage in any of the following prohibited activities:

Use NomNom for any unlawful purpose or to violate any laws.
Attempt to gain unauthorized access to any part of NomNom.
Interfere with the proper functioning of NomNom.
Upload or transmit any viruses, worms, or other malicious code.
Impersonate any person or entity, or falsely state or misrepresent your affiliation with a person or entity.
6. Disclaimer of Warranties

NomNom is provided "as is" and "as available" without any warranty of any kind, express or implied. We do not warrant that NomNom will be uninterrupted, secure, or error-free.

7. Limitation of Liability

In no event shall NomNom, its officers, directors, employees, or agents be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages, arising out of or in connection with your use of NomNom.

8. Governing Law

These Terms of Service shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of [insert jurisdiction], without regard to its conflict of law provisions.

9. Changes to Terms of Service

We reserve the right to modify or replace these Terms of Service at any time. Your continued use of NomNom after any such changes constitutes acceptance of the new Terms of Service.

10. Contact Us

If you have any questions about these Terms of Service, please contact us.

By using NomNom, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service. Thank you for choosing NomNom!

Thank you for shopping at NomNom. We want to ensure that you are completely satisfied with your purchase. If you are not entirely satisfied with your purchase, we're here to help.

1. Returns

At NomNom, we strive to ensure your satisfaction with every purchase. You may request a return or exchange of your items under the following circumstances:

If the items received do not match the type or design specified in your order or as displayed on our website at the time of purchase.
If the quantity received is insufficient or does not meet the specifications stated in your order.
If the items show visible external damage such as torn packaging, peeling, or breakage.
You have 24 hours (Brownie, Butter) and 14 days (Cookies, Dried-fruits, Biscotti, Nuts and Granola) to return the items from the date you received it. To be eligible for a return, your item must be unused and in the same condition that you received it. Your item must be in the original packaging. Your item needs to have the receipt or proof of purchase.



2. Refunds 

Once we receive your item, we will inspect it and notify you that we have received your returned item. We will immediately notify you on the status of your refund after inspecting the item. If your return is approved, we will initiate a refund to your credit card (or original method of payment). You will receive the credit within a certain amount of days, depending on your card issuer's policies.

3. Shipping cost

You will be responsible for paying for your own shipping costs for returning your item. Shipping costs are non­refundable.

4. Contact Us 

If you have any questions on how to return your item to us, contact us immediately.

5. Policy Changes 

NomNom reserves the right to modify or amend this policy at any time. Any changes will be effective immediately upon posting to the site. Your continued use of the site following the posting of changes to these terms will mean you accept those changes.

By shopping at NomNom, you agree to be bound by this Return and Refund Policy. Thank you for choosing NomNom!

Thank you for shopping at NomNom. We offer various payment methods to make your shopping experience convenient and secure. By using our website and services, you agree to comply with the following payment terms:

1. Payment Methods 

We accept the following forms of payment:

By cash when you buy products at NomNom physical stores
Credit cards (Visa and Mastercard)
Debit cards
E-wallet (ZaloPay, VNPay and MoMo)
COD
2. Payment Processing 

Your payment will be processed at the time of placing your order. We use secure payment processing platforms to ensure the safety of your personal and financial information. 

3. Currency 

All prices listed on our website are in VND. If you are shopping from a different country, your credit card company or bank may charge additional conversion fees. Please check with your financial institution for more information.

4. Sales Tax 

Sales tax will be applied to your order based on the applicable tax rate for your shipping address. The total amount, including any applicable taxes, will be displayed at checkout before you confirm your order.

5. Order Confirmation 

Once your payment is processed successfully, you will receive an order confirmation email with details of your purchase. Please review this email carefully and contact us immediately if you notice any discrepancies.

6. Payment Security 

We prioritize the security of your payment information and utilize industry-standard encryption protocols to safeguard your data during transmission. However, NomNom is not responsible for any unauthorized access or breaches that may occur due to factors beyond our control.

7. Payment Disputes 

If you believe there is an error in your payment transaction or if you have any payment-related disputes, please contact us promptly to resolve the issue. We are committed to providing assistance and resolving any payment-related concerns to the best of our ability.

8. Policy Changes 

NomNom reserves the right to modify or amend these payment terms at any time. Any changes will be effective immediately upon posting to the site. Your continued use of the site following the posting of changes to these terms will mean you accept those changes.

By making a purchase at NomNom, you agree to be bound by these payment terms. Thank you for choosing NomNom!
Are there any special promotions or discounts available on NomNom\'s website?
Yes, NomNom regularly offers special promotions and discounts to its customers.

With NomNom, customers do not have to worry, because we are committed to providing good quality products at affordable prices. In particular, customers will receive the product and pay at the same time.
Are there any risks if I order online?
If I buy products in large quantities, will the price be reduced?
When purchasing in large quantities, customers will enjoy incentives and discounts right at the time of purchase.
What are product return and exchange policies?

Customers please refer to NomNom\'s product return policy to be provided with the most complete and detailed information.\n\nNote: All products can be returned within 14 days from the date of receipt and the goods are guaranteed to retain their original product labels. (unused)
I made a purchase, but I don\'t like it, can I return it?

When purchasing, if you are not satisfied with the product, please let The Swan know and we will immediately exchange the product for you. Just make sure the product is unused and has intact labels. We will support exchanges for customers.
What payment methods are accepted on NomNom\'s website?
NomNom accepts various payment methods, including Momo, ZaloPay, VNPay, Internet Banking and Cash on Delivery (COD)
How long does it take for NomNom to deliver orders?
NomNom offers\ndelivery within 2-4 working days and fast delivery within 2 hours.
How does NomNom ensure the quality of its products?
By sourcing the finest ingredients and adhering to strict quality standards.
Can customers track their orders on NomNom\'s website?
Yes, NomNom provides order tracking services to allow customers to monitor the status of their purchases.
How can customers contact NomNom for inquiries or assistance?
Customers can reach out to NomNom for inquiries or assistance through email, phone, or social media channels.
